name: Validate email addresses from Gmail using MailboxValidator and adding their data to Google Sheets
description: Everytime a new email is received in Gmail, Make will automatically validate the email address using MailboxValidator. If the email address is verified, it will look that peron up using Clearbit. If a result is returned it will add that person to a specific Google Sheet based on the validation result of that email address . If no result is returned from Clearbit an error will occur which will be handled by an error handler. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
